attributes.action: Increase sickness policies to help people to rest rather than take antibiotics.
attributes.background: The PHE have advised that people rest rather than take antibiotics. Over the past few years sickness policies have become much tighter as a cost cutting measure making it very hard for working people to rest sufficiently to recover without antibiotics.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
